Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Smeets Stam Maassen on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Smeets Stam Maassen is a 31 year old General Manager from Netherlands.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Smeets Stam Maassen is currently divorced. He has 1 kid called Dekkers.
Education Background:
In 2011, Smeets graduated from Stedelijk Lyceum Enschede with a secondary school diploma.
In 2018, Smeets graduated from Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam - School of Business and Economics with a degree.
Occupation History:
Smeets Stam Maassen is a 31 year old General Manager from Netherlands.
Smeets Stam Maassen's first role was as a Hotel Manager at NH Hotel Group Nederland B.V., where he worked diligently from 2017 to 2018 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of General Manager at Marriott International Nederland B.V. in 2018, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 90000 EUR.
He has flat located in Boxtel, worth 1010000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 2060000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Private Equity Manager, in 2016, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
